title: Feature Engineering V_1.0
description: Objective In the last notebook we create our baseline model including a feature selection part.  Cohen cappa score of 0.456 (lb) with a local cv score of 0.529 In this notebook we are going to add more features and remove others that i think they overfitt the train set and then check if our local cv score improve. Next, we will check if this improvement aligns with the lb.
